form.label: Summary Table: Phase 1: Rollup Train Lates

panel.title: Rollup Train Lates to Summary Index

table.title: Get late values for all trains and write them a single event per day.

search.query: index=main late!=999 | timechart span=1d max(late) by trainno limit=2500 | foreach * [ eval lates=mvappend(lates, '<<FIELD>>')] | fields _time lates | eval lates=mvjoin(lates, ",") | collect index=summary sourcetype=lates_by_day
